attributes.action: Andrew Walker Susan Walker Sarah Collins Scott Collins David Grimmer Peter Grimmer Olga Walker David Gregory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be a gennerell Increase in all benefits to cover some of the rise in living cost's I.E fuel food rents ect 
for whatever the reason pepole find themselves unemployed or dissabled and some no longer able to work 
well there bills like everyone elses have significantly risen in recent months and are set to rise furthur still and pushing them deeper into despair and poverty as they simply cant do a bit of overtime to make extra money
and there is a lot of talk about helping home owners and pepol in work cope with these rises but none about helping those out of work or dissabled
it is about time this Labour Goverment did something the Tory's never did and actually help these pepol instead of punishing them 
thelp these pepole the most vunrable in our socioty and it may be said the very ones that we really should be helping the most 
Please sign this potition as it is very important 
THANKYOU !!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
